response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value and the benefits it provides, I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional deal considering the product's worth to you is $10,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information.", "product_price": 9500}
